revised_title: Fossil Reptilia Research and Classification in Cape Colony
tldr: The author conducted research on the structure, organization, and classification of fossil reptiles in Cape Colony. They identified five zones in the Karroo rocks, each characterized by different types of reptilian fossils. The author discovered a new specimen of Pareiasaurus, a massive reptile with short, solid, and heavy limb bones, and provided insights into its skeletal structure and classification.
